rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Now who's gone and become the owner
of Elgeschel Hobby Store, eh?

rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I was saving up money to buy
that place myself, you know!

rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Though I have to admit,
this game Dealing Kingdoms
is an absolute blast.

rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0004
rows.name:
It's based on Duelling Kingdoms,
but the added Nopon Trade Guild
elements give it so much more depth!

rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0005
rows.name:
And this Plumber Escape Game is
fantastic too! Me and the kids
play it together most every day.

rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I guess it's thanks to the new
owner that we've got all these
great new games in the lineup now.

rows.label: tlk45500152_04_msg0007
rows.name:
So while it kills me to admit
it, maybe I should be thanking
them. Whoever they are.
